text: Donovan Richards is an American politician. In December 2020, he became the Borough President of Queens. He was a New York City Council member representing the 31st District of the New York City Council. He is a Democrat. ==References== Category:Living people Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians Category:21st-century American politicians Category:African-American politicians Category:1983 births Category:Borough Presidents
title: Donovan Richards
